desc.message: Gather information from customers securely and easily with SalesAssist, the
desc.message_end: that streamlines your information collection process with data encryption and automation, from within your CRM.

home.button: Your Ultimate CRM Booster - Book Demo!

iteraction.title: A Sales Action for Every Interaction
iteraction.desc: No matter what your sales process is, SalesAssist has a Sales Action to streamline your customer facing interactions, from e-Signatures to document collection to e-Forms.

completiontools.title: Embedded In and Fully Integrated With Your CRM
completiontools.desc: Have a complete arsenal of every possible info-gathering widget in a single panel, right from your CRM. All information and documents gathered enter your CRM in real time, with audit trail

actions.name: Get Docs
actions.title: Collect documents in real-time
actions.desc: Allow customers to upload documents on the spot with their mobile device. Stop chasing customers to scan and upload documents and increase the speed and completion rate.

actions.name: e-Form
actions.title: Make all your forms smart
actions.desc: Reduce unnecessary errors, increase the completion rate and shorten the form fill time, with forms that are made for mobile completion and are fully integrated with all of your existing systems.

actions.name: e-Signature
actions.title: Make e-Signatures fast, easy, mobile
actions.desc: Send customers agreements for e-Signatures that are designed for mobile completion. Complete sales agreements in real time, with much higher completion rates than legacy eSign.

actions.name: Product Sharing
actions.title: Better remote sales
actions.desc: Share product visuals and details while speaking with customers to ensure they are fully informed and excited about what they're purchasing.

actions.name: Request Referrals
actions.title: Maximize each relationship
actions.desc: Make it easy for customers to refer friends and family. As soon as customers share a referral a new opportunity is created and assigned in your CRM.

actions.name: Get Reviews
actions.title: Easily collect reviews
actions.desc: Make it extremely easy for your customers to leave a review. Send personalized text/email links that customers can tap and instantly leave reviews on their platform of choice.

actions.name: Secure Payments
actions.title: Collect payments seamlessly
actions.desc: Collect payments in real-time without web redirects or inefficient IVR systems. Using personalized payment links, quickly and securely collect payments wherever your customers and salespeople are.

actions.name: ID Verification
actions.title: Add convenient security
actions.desc: Stay secure without adding friction to your sales process. Use real-time ID verification straight from your customer's smartphones, eliminating the need for in-person visits or emailing of documents.

actions.name: Digital Consent
actions.title: Gain fast, easy and compliant consent
actions.desc: Eliminate the time consuming and error-prone script reading. Send customers a T&C they can accept immediately (e.g., through checkboxes) right from their mobile device.

kanvasActions.name: Multitenancy
kanvasActions.title: Company and User Management in a single place.
kanvasActions.desc: Easily create, modify, group, remove, and set permission roles for companies and users.

kanvasActions.name: Customers (CRM)
kanvasActions.title: Customers are the most important part of any business.
kanvasActions.desc: Handle customer information, communication, and relationships in a single place. Manage your sales process and customer journey from lead to customer.

kanvasActions.name: Inventory
kanvasActions.title: Handle your inventory in a single place.
kanvasActions.desc: Extend your e-commerce solution with headless bundles, create marketplaces, or build your own inventory management UI.

kanvasActions.name: Social
kanvasActions.title: Add social media features to any app.
kanvasActions.desc: Share products, follow users, create groups, messaging, comments, likes and more. All the building blocks you need to add a social to your app.

kanvasActions.name: Workflow
kanvasActions.title: Connect Kanvas modules with other systems.
kanvasActions.desc: Set rules to trigger actions based on events you define within the Kanvas Ecosystem. After a lead is created, send it to your CRM or send a notification to your team. You define it.

gewaerActions.name: Client Portal
gewaerActions.title: Client Portal
gewaerActions.desc: Enhance client interaction by keeping them updated on projects, securely uploading data, and easily tracking progress. Simplify communication without manual challenges.

gewaerActions.name: Agent Portal
gewaerActions.title: Agent Portal
gewaerActions.desc: Elevate team efficiency with Gewaer's Agent Management. Seamlessly monitor agents, boost productivity, and streamline commissions for a successful partnership.

gewaerActions.name: Business Market Places
gewaerActions.title: Business Marketplaces
gewaerActions.desc: Open new business avenues. A central hub for sellers, clients, and partners to buy seamlessly. Enjoy secure, personalized interactions for a smoother business experience.

gewaerActions.name: Contract Hub
gewaerActions.title: Contract Hub
gewaerActions.desc: Share products, follow users, create groups, messaging, comments, likes and more. All the building blocks you need to add a social to your app.

gewaerActionsEs.name: Agiliza pedidos
gewaerActionsEs.title: Agiliza pedidos:
gewaerActionsEs.desc: Facilita a vendedores y choferes la gestión y administración de pedidos y datos de clientes de manera eficiente. Automatiza la validación de crédito y cobros y asigna pedidos para entrega, agilizando el flujo de trabajo y permitiendo el acceso en tiempo real, optimizando así el proceso y reduciendo la necesidad de intervención manual.

gewaerActionsEs.name: Automatización de procesos de aprobación
gewaerActionsEs.title: Automatización de procesos de aprobación:
gewaerActionsEs.desc: El flujo de aprobación automatizado a través de los departamentos asegura una gestión fluida y reduce el tiempo de espera desde la creación hasta la aprobación del pedido.

gewaerActionsEs.name: Asignación Inteligente de Pedidos
gewaerActionsEs.title: Asignación Inteligente de Pedidos:
gewaerActionsEs.desc: Los pedidos aprobados se asignan automáticamente a los conductores, optimizando la logística de entrega.

gewaerActionsEs.name: Información Actualizada en Tiempo Real
gewaerActionsEs.title: Información Actualizada en Tiempo Real
gewaerActionsEs.desc: Tanto vendedores como conductores tienen acceso a la información actualizada de las entregas, lo que permite un manejo eficiente del tiempo y recursos.

gewaerActionsEs.name: Seguimiento en Vivo:
gewaerActionsEs.title: Seguimiento en Vivo:
gewaerActionsEs.desc: Rastrea el estado de cada pedido en tiempo real. Con categorías como 'En Revisión', 'Aprobado', 'Despachado' y 'Facturado', siempre estarás al tanto del progreso.

automated.title: Complete Sales Faster with Automated Workflows
automated.desc: Info-gathering tools are scattered and don’t play nice together, we’re here to fix that. Connect all your info-gathering tools and create perfect custom-made workflows. Automate your sales team's work so they can crush sales goals.

completionprocess.title: Let Us Assist and Guide Your Info-Gathering Process
completionprocess.desc: Gathering information and documents from customers is often the most time consuming part of the business. We’ll assist your team with smart suggestions based on real time signals, so they know who, when, how and what to focus on to complete more sales.

changesPage.title: Case studies from some of our customers

changes.title: Positive Reviews
changes.cont: by streamlining the sales completion process

home.meta: Gather information from customers securely and easily with SalesAssist, the Ultimate CRM Booster that streamlines your information collection process with data encryption and automation.

hero.title: Secure Info-Gathering on Autopilot
hero.desc: Your current way of gathering info from customers is time consuming, antiquated and unsecured. This results in long deal times, bad customer experiences, and potential steep compliance penalties. SalesAssist automates the way you gather info from customers, directly from within your CRM.

reasons.title: Benefits Business
reasons.desc: Eliminate compliance liability; Shorten the sales process; Boost conversion rate.

reasons.title: Benefits Salespeople
reasons.desc: Free up your salespeople to do more value-added work; Eliminate data entry errors.

reasons.title: Benefits Customers
reasons.desc: Improve your customer's experience by streamlining the sales process.

benefits.title: More sales
benefits.desc: Simplify the sales process so your sales team has more time to do what matters most — sell more.

benefits.title: Improve NPS
benefits.desc: Provide a frictionless and convenient experience to your customers by completing the sale straight from their phones.

benefits.title: Save money
benefits.desc: Replace the many one-off applications and systems you currently use to complete the sale with off-the-shelf or custom Sales Actions.

benefits.title: Complete sales faster
benefits.desc: Make your salespeople super efficient by simplifying the collection and sharing of information. Handling customer interactions has never been easier!

benefits.title: Less mundane work
benefits.desc: No more chasing customers for emails, scans, and papers, or switching between multiple systems to manually enter information to complete the sale.

benefits.title: Reduce errors
benefits.desc: Reduce unnecessary errors with e-Forms and e-Signatures that are smart, fully integrated with all of your existing systems.

benefits.title: Reduce friction
benefits.desc: Eliminate the emails, scans, multiple portals and all the back and forth by completing the sale straight from customers’ mobile device

benefits.title: Save time
benefits.desc: Slash time by allowing customers to complete everything on their mobile device, from e-Signatures to uploading documents to e-Forms.

benefits.title: Delight customers
benefits.desc: Create happy and returning customers by providing a frictionless and personalized sales experience.

howItWorks.title: Simple To Use By Sales Team
howItWorks.desc: 3 easy steps to transform your sales completion process without changing it – no retraining necessary.

actions.title: Share Completion Tasks
actions.desc: Salespeople simply share the relevant Completion Tasks with their customers to review, fill out, sign, and submit, right from their mobile devices.

actions.title: Monitor Completion Status
actions.desc: Salespeople have full visibility of the customers’ completion status - whether and when they have opened and completed the Tasks.

actions.title: Receive Data
actions.desc: All the data and files collected from the customers automatically import into your CRM and other SOR based on the workflows established.

Customers.title: Simple to Use by Customers
Customers.desc: Provide customers with instant, real-time, mobile-first completion experiences. Interactions with their salesperson are done in the fastest and most personalized way, Amazon style. By receiving personalized texts customers can simply click on the provided links to enter, sign, upload, verify, pay, choose, etc., whatever is needed to complete the sale.

banner.text: Let’s Simplify How You Gather Info from Customers

bullet_points.title: Frictionless Interactions
bullet_points.desc: Give customers what they expect, a seamless end-to-end journey.

bullet_points.title: End-to-End Integration
bullet_points.desc: Let SalesAssist do all the heavy lifting and give back valuable time to your salespeople.

bullet_points.title: Real-time Completion
bullet_points.desc: Have your salespeople take timely actions, based on real-time suggestions.

swiperData.title: Simple to Manage by Leadership
swiperData.desc: We make it extremely easy for management to assemble the ideal Completion Panel for their sales team. On our web portal managers can easily select customizable off-the-shelf Completion Tools, integrate their existing ones, or mix and match.

show_case.title: Select off-the-shelf Completion Tools
show_case.desc: Choose off-the-shelf Completion Tool templates from our ever-growing Template Library.

show_case.title: Customize your own
show_case.desc: Modify texts, images, logos, documents, and page layout on the Completion Tools based on your needs.

show_case.title: Add to your Completion Panel
show_case.desc: Turn on and off Completion Tools on the Completion Panel and list them in the sequence you prefer.

pricingHero.title: Find a Plan That Fits
pricingHero.desc: Simple pricing structure with no upfront commitment or implementation costs. Flexibility built for organizations of any industry, use case, and size.

questions.question: Who is SalesAssist for?
questions.answer: Businesses who need to optimize their sales process to reach growing revenue targets. Those who value being efficient and providing an exceptional experience to their customers.

questions.question: Does SalesAssist integrate with my systems?
questions.answer: YES. We integrate with major CRMs and DMSs.

questions.question: Can I see SalesAssist before buying? How much is it?
questions.answer: Yes! Simply click “Book Demo”. For pricing, see our Pricing Page or talk to us today.

questions.question: What’s the difference between annual and monthly billing?
questions.answer: The difference is how often you pay your subscription fee. With monthly billing, you will be charged on the same day each month. With annual billing, you are charged once for the whole year.

questions.question: Which payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: There are different ways to pay for SalesAssist including major credit cards, debit cards and PayPal.

aboutUs.desc: At SalesAssist, our mission is to eliminate all waste from the sales process.
